articles.title: Delhi pollution: Day after Diwali, India capital wakes up to toxic haze - BBC
articles.description: People in the city burst crackers late into Monday night, defying a court order to use only 'green' fireworks.
articles.content:
India's capital Delhi woke up to a toxic haze as air quality worsened after the Hindu festival of Diwali, despite a court directive to use less-polluting crackers.
People set off fireworks during th… [+3570 chars]
